statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); if [[ $cwd == "$HOME/github/"*/* ]]; then relative="${cwd#$HOME/github/}"; org=$(echo "$relative" | cut -d'/' -f1); repo=$(echo "$relative" | cut -d'/' -f2); rest=$(echo "$relative" | cut -d'/' -f3-); printf '\033[32mgithub(\033[1;36m%s/%s\033[32m)\033[0m ' "$org" "$repo"; [[ -n "$rest" ]] && printf '\033[36m%s\033[0m ' "$rest"; else printf '\033[1;36m%s\033[0m ' "$(basename "$cwd")"; fi; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); [[ -n "$branch" ]] && printf '\033[34mgit:%s\033[0m ' "$branch"; fi; printf '| %s' "$model"
